page.title: 13 Sports Day 1985
page.content: On the 9th of July we had our school {sports day.}We held it on the playing field. The 5 year olds to 11 year olds took part. There were 44 different { {races. } There were flat races where you just run up to the finish line and spider races where you get on your hands and feet and run. Some of the{events}like high jump and long jump were done before. Some were{relay races}like the balloon race where you run and burst the balloon. Mr Giles, our teacher, had to pop some of them with his pen. There was a slow cycle race where you try to be last. There were cups for the best boys team, best girls team, best overall team and best sports person. There was a toddlers race and there was ice pops for everybody at the end.
